English: Welcome to Keakoon, human! I've got a favor to ask... C'mere!
Traditional_Chinese: 科科科，善良的人類啊，可以幫我一個忙嗎？

English: Fathers Package
Traditional_Chinese: 父親的行李

English: Hrrmph! How strange... How did a human like you manage to get in here, anyway?
Traditional_Chinese: 科科科，你們人類會來到這裡，真是太稀奇了啊！

English: Thank you for saving my father, human. So what brings you here?
Traditional_Chinese: 真的很謝謝你幫助了我的父親。來找我有什麼事嗎?

English: Please, save my father. He's imprisoned east of here! Hurry!
Traditional_Chinese: 我父親被關在奇昆村莊最右邊的監獄裡面。欸，快點救他出來啦！

English: Hrrmph, listen... I don't know how you found this place, and I don't care. Leave now! This place is too dangerous for your kind.
Traditional_Chinese: 科科科，我不知道你們人類是如何來到這裡的，這裡可不是你該來的地方。這裡很危險，快快回去吧！

English: Hrrmph! I am Drian - Son of Nevil, the Patriarch of Keakoon. You people look down on us, but you're the inferior ones!
Traditional_Chinese: 科科科，我是奇昆族的酋長的兒子[得安]，你們人類總覺得我們很笨，可是在我們的眼中，人類才是更無能的一方。

English: This place is too dangerous for the likes of you, silly human. Go home!
Traditional_Chinese: 科科科，總之這裡很危險，快快回去吧！

English: Here is the package my father left me... Hrrmph!
Traditional_Chinese: 父親留給我的行李，就在這裡，科科科。

English: *Sigh* this might take a while...
Traditional_Chinese: 唉...事情真難搞啊...

English: What? A human?! Here?!? Muahahahah!!! You're either brave or not all there in the head, buddy.
Traditional_Chinese: 哦？你...是人類吧。真有種呢！

English: Ewww!! A hew-mann... Your kind is not welcome here. Get out of my sight, vermin!
Traditional_Chinese: 切！只不過是個人類卻那麼囂張！快點給我滾！不然我讓你見識矮人拳法的厲害!

English: Who am I? Hah! Liked I'd consort with the likes of a human. Get lost!
Traditional_Chinese: 真遺憾，我無意向人類介紹自己。

English: Beat it, human! You're not welcome here!
Traditional_Chinese: 沒錯！你快點回家比較好。這裡不是你們人類該來的地方。

English: *Whistles*
Gwarrll! You just gonna stand there, or are you gonna get me out of here? You know, people don't necessarily like to be stared at...
Traditional_Chinese: 格瓦爾！你就呆站在這，還是讓我離開這裡？你知道每個人都不喜歡被盯著瞧…

English: Garr!! I've not seen a human in years! I am Nevil, the honorable Patriarch of Keakoon.
Traditional_Chinese: 喀喀喀...哦，好久沒看過人類了！我是奇昆族的酋長[藍彼]噠！

English: *Snort!* A human, eh? Very interesting... I haven't seen one of you weirdos in years! See ya later!
Traditional_Chinese: 喀喀喀，好久沒見到人類了啊，有機會下次再見囉！

English: Feel free to come see me whenever you are in need of magical goods.
Traditional_Chinese: 需要魔法用品嗎？請找我吧！

English: Nice to meet you. Have you also come to research the magical fields surrounding the islands?
Traditional_Chinese: 你會來到這座島，是不是你也跟我一樣對於魔法磁力的研究感興趣呢？很高興認識你。

English: My name is Ciel and I am doing research on the various magical phenomena in the area.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是[希艾拉]，看起來這個區域發生了與魔法有關的異常現象，所以過來研究了。

English: Farewell!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你好運！

English: Come to me if you seek absolution.
Traditional_Chinese: 懺悔罪惡，請求原諒的人呀，過來吧。

English: Are you here for confession?
Traditional_Chinese: 來找我懺悔的嗎？

English: Your aura shines brightly. May it never again lose its brilliance.
Traditional_Chinese: 你的表情看起來很陽光啊。願你人生的路途也會如此光明。

English: I am a shepherd who helps sinners find their way back to the path of righteousness. Come to me if you wish to be cleansed.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是拯救像你這樣的罪人的[赫龍]牧師。如果你想懺悔你的罪，並請求原諒的話，那就過來和我談談吧。

English: Get the key from one of the criminal Masquerpets. Once you get the key you can enter the Warp Zone in the mountains.
Traditional_Chinese: 從罪犯怪物中取得鑰匙吧。只要拿到鑰匙就能夠從傳送空間進到山裡面。

English: Good luck to you, stranger. Try not to get caught again, okay?
Traditional_Chinese: 再會了陌生人，不要再犯錯了，好嗎？

English: You will not survive here without a shield, friend.
Traditional_Chinese: 毫無防備的你還可以在這裡生存！你真是不簡單啊！

English: Huh? Do you want something from me? Then speak up!
Traditional_Chinese: 嗯？想要我的東西嗎？那你就說吧！

English: My name is Rocbin and I came here for a number of reasons, none of which I would like to discuss with you at this time. Now shoo!
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫[羅賓]。我會來到這裡有很多原因，現在我不太想跟你說這些。你給我安靜！

English: Take care!
Traditional_Chinese: 慢走，請多保重！

English: Looking to work on your terrible equipment? Allow me to assist you!
Traditional_Chinese: 你看看你那糟糕的裝備？快讓我來幫你吧！

English: Hahaha! You look like the rest of those felons. What brings you here?
Traditional_Chinese: 哈哈哈！你看你的樣子就像是犯了罪。是什麼風把你吹來這？

English: Greetings, adventurer! I am Shun, your friendly neighborhood arms dealer. I don't care who you are, a customer is a customer. Come right over and buy my gear!
Traditional_Chinese: 您好，冒險家！我是[順]。你們友善的武器商人。我不在乎你是誰，客人就是客人，快過來買我的裝備！

English: Hehehe! Alright I hope we can hang out together someday.
Traditional_Chinese: 嘿嘿嘿！好吧，希望我們哪天能一起去喝一杯。

English: I sell supplies to the weary adventurer. I've got everything you need!
Traditional_Chinese: 我販售補給品給疲憊的冒險者。我有你需要的所有物品！

English: You look like you have something to tell me...
Traditional_Chinese: 你看起來像是有話想對我說…

English: My name is Yuna. I believe you will find my food and medicine reasonably priced.
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫[優娜]。我相信你會發現我的食物跟補品的價格非常合理唷。

English: Come one, come all! Visit Achaben's General Shop for your adventuring needs! *cough*
Traditional_Chinese: 照過來，照過來！快來安迪的雜貨店滿足你的冒險需求！

English: May I help you?
Traditional_Chinese: 我能幫你什麼呢？

English: *Cough* I am happy to have a *wheeez* customer! If you need it, we have it... *cough* *huck* You wouldn't happen to have some cough medicine, would you?
Traditional_Chinese: 真高興我有顧客了！如果你需要它，而我剛好也有它…你會不會剛好也有一些止咳藥吧？有嗎？

English: *Ha-CHEW!* Sorry about that, allow me to clear my throat. *AHEM* My name is Achaben, and I run the General Shop here in Darken City. *cough*
Traditional_Chinese: 抱歉，讓我清個嗓子，我叫安迪，在得肯經營雜貨店。

English: Thank you for your patronage! Come back and visit sometime! Bring some cough medicine!
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝光臨！有空回來看看！還有帶點止咳藥！

English: #b#cff0001ffFlying Information#nc#nb is available here! I also have #b#cffff0000flying boards and brooms#nc#nb in stock!
Traditional_Chinese: #b#cff0001ff飛行資訊#nc#nb 這邊提供！　另外還有#b#cffff0000飛行滑板跟掃帚#nc#nb 的商品唷！

English: What do you want to do?
Traditional_Chinese: 你想要做什麼？

English: Flying through the clouds high above Madrigal is my favorite dream come true. I would be flying right now, but I'm having some family trouble and I need to pay the bills!
Traditional_Chinese: 我快要實現飛越瑪德利賈天際的夢想。…只要我的家庭沒有倒下去的話…

English: My name is Almani, and I run the Station here in Darken city. I sell flying boards and brooms in addition to teaching the basics of flying.
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫阿爾瑪尼，我在得肯經營這個航空站。我販賣飛行滑板跟掃帚，以及教授飛行的相關知識唷。

English: 1. First, you'll need to buy a broom or a board and be at least level 20 in order to fly. \n 2. Next, double-click the board or broom in your inventory or simply move it to a hot key to climb aboard.
Traditional_Chinese: 1. 請先在航空站購買可以飛行的掃帚或滑版，並且至少要達到20級才可以飛行。\n2. 開啟物品欄，雙擊所購買的飛行器或是將其移動至快捷鍵點選即可裝備完成。

English: 3. Press the Space Bar to accelerate your flying vehicle. Press the Space Bar key again while moving to stop. Think of the accelerator like a toggle button for *Go* and *Stop*.
Traditional_Chinese: 3.按空白鍵開始加速飛行器。移動時再次按下空白鍵就會停下。將按鍵想像為加速與停止的切換按鈕。

English: 4. To navigate, you can simply hold the Right Mouse Button down and angle the camera in the direction that you want to go.\n Alternatively, you can also use the W, A, S and D controls to turn.
Traditional_Chinese: 4.按著滑鼠右鍵就可以調整方向。\n另外使用鍵盤W、S、A、D也可以操作。

English: 5. Additionally, you can simply tap the Right Mouse Button twice to lock the camera to the mouse pointer. This allows you to navigate without holding down the right mouse button. Clicking twice again will turn off this effect.
Traditional_Chinese: 5.此外，您只需要點擊滑鼠右鍵兩次即可將相機鎖定在鼠標上。這允許您在不按住滑鼠右鍵的情況下導航。再次點擊右鍵兩次即可關閉效果。

English: 6. Anyone can fly in Madrigal. You simply have to acquire a flying vehicle!\n 7. There are numerous makes and models of flying vehicles. Trying shopping around in player shops or click the Use Premium Item Shop icon next to the Start Button.
Traditional_Chinese: 6.任何人都可以在瑪德利賈飛行。你只需要獲得一輛飛行器。\n7.飛行器有許多品牌跟型號。嘗試在玩家商店購物或使用高級物品商店購入。

English: I hope the information I gave you was helpful. You're on your own now, aviator! See you in the clouds!
Traditional_Chinese: 以上是基本的飛行介紹，剩下的就靠你自己了，雲端上見吧！

English: 1. Occasionally, you will run into some pesky masquerpets while flying. You will see a red box surrounding them.
Traditional_Chinese: 1.偶爾，你會在飛行中遇到討厭的魔域怪物。與怪物的達到一定的距離，怪物周圍就會顯示攻擊方格。

English: 2. You can target these creatures with the Left Mouse Button. If you lose sight of them while flying, a green arrow appears on the edge of the screen to indicate which direction you need to turn.
Traditional_Chinese: 2.可以按下點選滑鼠左鍵來鎖定怪物。如果飛行時看不到它們，螢幕邊緣會出現綠色箭頭，會指示您需要轉向哪個方向。

English: 3. To attack the creature, simply get as close as you can and press the Left Mouse Button or the Insert Key.\n 4. If you want to follow the monster automatically, press the Z Key.
Traditional_Chinese: 3.要攻擊鎖定的怪物，只需要可能地靠近，並按下"Insert"或選滑鼠左鍵。\n4.按下"z"則可以自動跟隨目標。

English: 5. Magicians and Acrobats can shoot from range while in the air. Mercenaries and Assists must rely on melee attacks. You can also use your skills!
Traditional_Chinese: 5. 魔法師和雜技師可以在空中進行遠程攻擊。勇者和輔助角色則必須依賴近戰攻擊。你也可以使用你的技能！

English: 6. When you destroy a flying masquerpet, any dropped loot will be placed into your inventory automatically. If there is no room in your inventory, the loot is lost, so be careful!
Traditional_Chinese: 6.當你打倒飛行的魔域怪物時，任何掉落的戰利品都會自動放入你的背包中。如果你的背包中沒有空間，戰利品就會消失，所以要注意！

English: 7. That about covers it for your flying combat training, cadet! Just one more thing... Don't crash and burn! Hahaha, just a little pilot humor.
Traditional_Chinese: 7.學員，關於你的飛行戰鬥訓練，還有一件事情…不要崩潰跟太過頭！哈哈哈，這只是一點點飛行員的幽默。

English: Have fun out there and be safe! Don't forget to check your six!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝您冒險愉快！別忘了確認第六項！

English: Goodbye, adventurer! Feel free to stop by again if you have any questions about flying.
Traditional_Chinese: 再見了，冒險者！如果您對飛行還有任何疑問，請隨時再次光臨。

English: The Red Bang Troupe will never break through our defenses as long as I'm here!
Traditional_Chinese: 只要我在這裡守護著，紅色崩崩是絕對不會闖進來的啦！

English: Hello, traveler. I have some missions for you!
Traditional_Chinese: 你好，旅行者!我有一些任務給你！

English: Greetings, traveler! You are welcome to visit the Erons Factory as long as I, Amadolka, am here. It can get pretty dangerous out here so watch your back!
Traditional_Chinese: 嗨~! 冒險者！ 只要我「亞瑪多」一直在這的話，歡迎你來參觀艾磷胚斯。 這裡可能會變得非常危險，所以要小心！

English: My name is Amadolka Liviehindekinas. I am in charge of security here at the Erons Factory. Why do you ask?
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字叫「亞瑪多 ．奇利比希」。 我是負責守護“艾磷胚斯”治安的人。 你問這個幹什麼？

English: Be careful out there, traveler! I'll stand guard here!
Traditional_Chinese: 在外面小心點，冒險者！ 放心去冒險吧!　這裡由我來守護就足夠了啦。

English: I'm such a coward! *Cries*
Traditional_Chinese: *嗚嗚*…“我真是個膽小鬼!!”…

English: The curse has been removed for the 3rd time now. Please don't get cursed again or it will be the last time for sure.
Traditional_Chinese: 現在詛咒已經被解除第三次了。請不要再被詛咒，否則這是最後一次了。

English: I'm the Mysterious Teller of Tales! Wanna hear something spooky?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是神秘的說書人！ 想聽一些恐怖的事情嗎？

English: Stop by anytime you wanna hear a spooky story!
Traditional_Chinese: 在任何時候,你想聽一個恐怖的故事就停下來！

English: ID Card
Traditional_Chinese: 礦山通行證

English: Hello there! How are you today!
Traditional_Chinese: 哈囉～哈囉～有事嗎？

English: Uhh, yes? If you've got something to say, say it. Otherwise leave me alone. I'm very busy securing these steel panels by tapping my foot repeatedly.
Traditional_Chinese: 呃，怎麼了？ 假如你有話要說，那就快說吧。我正忙著用腳固定敲擊這些鋼板。不然就別煩我。

English: That's none of your business and I'll thank you to stay out of my personal affairs.
Traditional_Chinese: 那不關你的事，還有我會感謝你不插手我私人事務！

English: Alright, hope to see you soon!
Traditional_Chinese: 好吧！希望快點見到你！～

English: Oh! You're asking about the ID Card that grants access to the Trillipy room in the mines, right? You should find Andre. I heard he spends most of his time in a forest filled with many ancient trees.
Traditional_Chinese: 啊！你是說毒甲蜈蚣的通行卡喔？你去找[安德烈]看看吧！

English: Hail and well met, adventurers! My name is Bolpor and I'm the best chef in town!
Traditional_Chinese: 歡迎歡迎！冒險者！我叫艾爾夫是鎮上最棒的廚師唷！

English: What do you want already?! I've got things to do!
Traditional_Chinese: 你還想要什麼？我還有事情要忙呢！

English: I'm the best chef in town, you got that? Anyone that tells you different is more than welcome to discuss it with my butcher knife. There will be more than just *chicken* on a stick on my menu...
Traditional_Chinese: 餐飲店當然是賣食物的啊？懂了吧？我還要說明這些嗎？

English: My name is Bolpor Centaurn, the best darn chef in Darken. I'm also the best looking. I didn't get this handsome overnight, you know.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是在得肯經營餐飲店的艾爾夫，請多多捧場！

English: See ya later, alligator! Mmm, alligator... that gives me an idea for a new dish!
Traditional_Chinese: 請慢走！

English: Only the bravest adventurer can hope to succeed on the path of the Knight Hero, Billaon. Are you worthy?
Traditional_Chinese: 只有最勇敢的冒險家才有希望在騎士英雄畢雷恩的道路上取得成功，你準備好了嗎?

English: We must never forget the sacrifice of the Heroes. We are here to train those who wish to follow their path in hopes of a worthy successor.
Traditional_Chinese: 世界恢復光明和平時，他們英勇的事蹟是不會被人們淡忘的！

English: I am Guardian Boneper. I'm here to protect the will of Billaon, the Knight Hero, at all costs. We are seeking those who are worthy enough to follow the path of the Knight Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是守護騎士英雄畢雷恩的騎士守護者波內佩拉，我們正在尋找那些值得追隨騎士英雄之路的人。

English: May the courage of Billaon be with you, adventurer.
Traditional_Chinese: 希望畢雷恩的勇氣一直與你同在，冒險者！

English: We are here to protect the will of the Heroes. Are you worthy to become a successor of the Billposter Hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 支持爆咒師英雄羅瓦特的人們啊！準備好繼承英雄的遺志了嗎？

English: I fear that those who follow Shade, Iblis and Bubble too closely will be destroyed by them in the end. Follow the path of the Heroes and you will not lose your way.
Traditional_Chinese: 不管是生是死！英雄的遺志要傳承下去！

English: My name is Guardian Capafe. I am here as a guide and I protect the will of Roentel, the Billposter Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是守護爆咒師英雄羅瓦特的爆咒師守護者[卡班沛]。

English: The power of Roentel will protect and guide you.
Traditional_Chinese: 以羅瓦特的力量為榮！

English: Rare metals and minerals reside deep within the Dekane Mine.
Traditional_Chinese: 礦山裡有石頭，又有鐵鎚…

English: You looking for some adventure? Why not discover the mystery of the curse of Darkon?
Traditional_Chinese: 你對冒險很好奇喔？那你可以去嘗試解除得肯的秘密喔～

English: Now's not the time for pleasantries, my simple-minded friend. Besides, I know you don't actually care. No one does...
Traditional_Chinese: 向我問好喔…沒想到會有人來向我問好耶…不要囉唆了啦！快說你來找我的目的是什麼？

English: Fine, leave if you want to! I don't need your help, fool!
Traditional_Chinese: 你想去就去吧！反正不會有人管我！

English: Have you ever heard the name Neverant? Few know it now, but long ago it was the top-ranking mining guild in Darkon. I used to be a member of that guild.
Traditional_Chinese: 以前有一個礦山…那個礦山很大呢～可是這個礦山現在已經不存在了，當時我也是那個礦山的礦工了呢～

English: Today, the Neverant Guild is no more. It's hierarchy was torn apart by a terrible curse that emanated from the mine itself. Ironic, isn't it?
Traditional_Chinese: 礦山現在已經不存在了，被詛咒的塔凱黎斯變成了沒落的礦山..可憐的礦山~

English: Check out the Dekane Mine west of here if you want. I won't step foot near there.
Traditional_Chinese: 你可以在得肯找塔凱黎斯啦！

English: Chenbing's Shield Shop is open for business! The best finely-crafted nomad shields penya can buy!
Traditional_Chinese: 趁風的盾牌店開始營業了！金幣就可以買到最好的精心製作的遊牧盾牌！這裡是有賣上等的防具，請好好挑選！

English: Well, what are you gonna do for me? Hmmm?
Traditional_Chinese: 有什麼可以幫忙的嗎？

English: We, the Khan Union, are traveling merchants. Our fine craftsmanship is well-known throughout Madrigal. So whaddya say? Interested in taking a peek at my inventory?
Traditional_Chinese: 卡恩商人組織有販售瑪德利賈賣最好的商品喔！！

English: I am Chenbing Khan and I sell the best, finely-crafted, and affordable shields you'll find anywhere in Madrigal.
Traditional_Chinese: 您好！我是趁風！我販賣最好的、製作精良的、價格實惠的防具，你可以在瑪德利賈的任何地方找到它。

English: Take care! Tell your friends about us!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝飛行愉快！

English: So, have you completed that which you needed to in order to proceed?
Traditional_Chinese: 到達目的地了嗎？還是要繼續移動呢？

English: What do you want?
Traditional_Chinese: 有需要什麼嗎？

English: You couldn't possibly hope to understand what lies beyond this gate. I don't care how much research you've done.
Traditional_Chinese: 別打瞌睡！保持警戒！

English: Don't concern yourself with such things. Who I am is of no consequence to you. All you need to know is that I am here to protect this gate.
Traditional_Chinese: 你說你不認識我，好歹我是看守這裡的人耶！

English: Farewell, strange one.
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你好運喔~

English: Hey, you there! Help me! Let me out of here right now! Argh!!!
Traditional_Chinese: 喂!那邊有沒有人可以救救我啊!

English: Oh thank Rhisis, I knew someone would come! Oh thank you, thank you, thank you! Well, what are you doing just standing around? Let me out, darn it!!
Traditional_Chinese: 哦，謝謝黎席斯，我知道有人會來！ 噢，謝謝，謝謝，謝謝！ 好吧，你站在那裡做什麼？ 放我出去，可惡！！

English: Me? I, Colar Devoka, am the best actor in the Pepoview Troupe! Well, I was, but now I am stuck out here and this filthy cage waiting to be eaten by those filthy Leyenas.
Traditional_Chinese: 我?我是最棒的演技者凱樂拉啦。雖然現在是這個樣子，唉...

English: What?! HEY! I thought you were going to release me. I'll get you for this!
Traditional_Chinese: 喂!怎麼就這樣走掉了啊?把我救出來再走啦!臭XX蛋!

English: Follow the teachings of Lillip and you will discover the secrets of the elements.
Traditional_Chinese: 以黎利的智慧來改善這世界！呼~一直喊這些也挺累的~

English: Hello, friend. Listen, whatever happens in this world, you must not lose hope. As long as we follow the path of the Heroes, we will persevere.
Traditional_Chinese: 就算世界末日來臨！也不可以失去希望！

English: My name is Condram Griters and I am one of 8 priests of Lillip, the Elementor Hero. I am teaching the wisdom of Lillip to his successors. I act as a guide to those who follow the path of Lillip.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是柯登皮斯，八位研術者其中一位守祭司，研術者英雄黎利的師弟！我正在向他的繼任者傳授黎利的智慧，為那些追隨黎利的人提供指導。

English: Farewell, young one. May Lillip guide and protect you.
Traditional_Chinese: 好好運用智慧~與黎利看齊！

English: Heren, your legacy will carry on and your courage will not be forgotten.
Traditional_Chinese: 海琳！你的遺願終於實現了！

English: The might of the Blade will stand against those who seek to destroy us. Heren, the Blade Hero, has left a great legacy.
Traditional_Chinese: 勇敢的對抗邪惡，光明的一方永遠不會屈服的！

English: My name is Corel Anduril, and I am the Blade Master of Darken City. I was well known as a Blade Dancer before the war. Now, it is my duty to select those worthy of becoming a Blade and prepare them for what lies ahead.
Traditional_Chinese: 我就是暗殺者首領，有何指教？

English: May Heren be with you, always.
Traditional_Chinese: 願海琳與你同在！

English: I honor the spirit of Offerep, the Psykeeper Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 念力師英雄歐布華啊~您的精神永為人們所歌頌！

English: Their last battle will resonate throughout eternity. The Heroes sacrificed themselves to save all of Madrigal. We are forever in their debt. Take with you the teachings of Offerep, adventurer.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄的事蹟，絕不會因為時間久遠而被人們遺忘！

English: My name is Cylor Mesmor and I am the Psykeeper Master. I guide those wishing to become Psykeepers. I have committed many sins in the past, and through the grace of Offerep, I have been forgiven.
Traditional_Chinese: 我就是念力師首領，有需要我幫忙的嗎？

English: Only through careful study will you learn the wisdom of the Psykeeper.
Traditional_Chinese: 希望能像念力師那般有堅定的意志！

English: Madrigal's ecosystem is so strange and mysterious! I love it!
Traditional_Chinese: 瑪德利賈的生態界非常神奇！

English: The masquerpets you see here around us were once the machines used in the Erons Factory down south. However, the exposure to waste coming from the factory turned them into the monsters they are today.
Traditional_Chinese: 你在我們周圍看到的怪物曾經是南方艾磷胚斯使用的機器。 然而，接觸來自工廠的廢物使他們變成了今天的怪物。

English: I'm surprised you haven't heard of me. I'm Dr. Est and I research Madrigal's ecosystem. My 2 brothers and I are thrilled to learn as much as we can about Madrigal. Have you met my brothers?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是Dr.法小紀，與2個兄弟研究瑪德利賈的相關事物。

English: Watch yourself out there, friend. Some creatures can be quite dangerous!
Traditional_Chinese: 小心喔！這裡的魔域怪很危險~

English: The will of Hynan will lead you to victory.
Traditional_Chinese: 浪人的英雄海楠會幫你的。

English: This is what you must to do.
Traditional_Chinese: 您應該要幫我…

English: The Heroes fought hard to protect us from Shade's evil masquerpet army. We owe them all our livelihood. That is why I have devoted my life in service to Hynan, the brave Ranger Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄們為保護我們免受史瑞德邪惡假面軍團的傷害而奮戰。我們欠他們所有的恩情，這就是為什麼我畢生致力於為勇敢的浪人英雄海楠服務。

English: I am Eliff, the Ranger Master. I have devoted my life to Hynan's legacy, and my duty is to pass along all that I have learned from him. I have sworn to uphold this promise until my last, dying breath.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是負責幫您走浪人之路的…我是浪人大師艾梨布。 我畢生致力於海楠的遺志，我的職責是將我從他那裡學到的一切傳遞下去。 我發誓要堅持這個承諾，直到我最後一口氣。

English: Hynan watches over us all. Go in peace, my friend.
Traditional_Chinese: [海楠]會祝福您的…安心去吧！我的朋友

English: Aenn's blessing on this world will be remembered forever.
Traditional_Chinese: 守護者英雄阿利安諾為人們所帶來的祝福將被永遠的記得！

English: Aenn, the Ringmaster Hero, was one of the most important of all of our brave Heroes. Aenn's rejuvenating magic blessed our brave heroes in battle.
Traditional_Chinese: 阿利安諾，守護者英雄，是我們所有勇敢的英雄中最重要的一位，阿利安諾復活的魔法在戰鬥中祝福了我們勇敢的英雄。

English: Hi! It is very nice to meet you. My name is Ellend Eledyo and I am the Ringmaster Master. Pretty cool title, huh? I love it, and what's more, I love guiding pupils on the path of the Ringmaster Hero, Aenn.
Traditional_Chinese: 你好！ 很高興認識你。 我的名字是愛嵐．依莉迪歐，我是守護者首領。 很酷的名號吧？ 我喜歡它，更重要的是，我喜歡引導學生走上大師英雄阿利安諾的道路。

English: Pray to Aenn for protection and you will have it.
Traditional_Chinese: 向阿利安諾祈求保護，你就會得到它。

English: A great creature is imprisoned here. Are you ready to challenge him?
Traditional_Chinese: 等待你們的挑戰喔~

English:
Why do you wish to challenge Clockworks?

2 [For Fun!][IDS_NPC_ForFun] 
3 [Meh, just because?][IDS_NPC_MehJustBecause]
Traditional_Chinese:
有什麼事啊？
1.[獵殺怪物][]
2.[無聊嗎～][]
3.[管你的！][]

Are you sure you're ready for this? Alright, successor, would you like to challenge Clockworks again?

您確定您準備好了嗎？好吧，繼任者，想再一次挑戰時空毀滅者了嗎？
[是][是_進入]/[不][不_入場]

#cffff0000 所有參與的工會成員必須靠近你才能進入。#nc

English: You defeated Clockworks? Excellent work, successor!
Traditional_Chinese: 實現了你的理想嗎？恭喜你喔！

English:
Only the honorable combatant is worthy of facing Clockworks. You are brave, successor. 
Are you ready to challenge Clockworks?
[Yes][IDS_NPC_Yes_Enter] / [No][IDS_NPC_No_Enter]

#cffff0000All the guild members participating must be close to you to enter.#nc
Traditional_Chinese:
只有光榮的戰士才有辦法面對時空毀滅者。展現勇氣吧，英雄的繼承人。
你準備好挑戰時空毀滅者了嗎？
[是][IDS_NPC_Yes_Enter] / [否][IDS_NPC_No_Enter]

English: This isn't a game you fool! Clockworks will tear you to pieces! Come back when you decide to be serious about this.
Traditional_Chinese: 要好好珍惜這世上的一切！

English: Just because? JUST BECAU... Ah, forget it. You're obviously not mature enough to handle this.
There are other brave souls locked in fierce combat with Clockworks at the moment. Their deaths will be swift. You must wait.
Traditional_Chinese: 其他挑戰者已經在對戰中，所以目前無法入場喔！

English: Make sure you are adequately prepared to face Clockworks. If you are not yet ready, then now is the time to prepare.
Traditional_Chinese: 你一定要徹底覺悟，不然是無法超越他的！

English: It's alright, young successor. Only the bravest of souls can hope to stand against the great Clockworks. We'll keep him imprisoned here until the right person is ready to face him.
Traditional_Chinese: 要往後退？抱歉，我可沒注意到！

English: Roentel, Roentel, where for art thou, Roentel!?
Traditional_Chinese: 羅瓦特需要你的力量！

English: Nothing will ever change if we forget the blessings of those who sacrificed themselves to protect all of us. Those who do not learn from the past, are doomed to repeat it.
Traditional_Chinese: 不管怎樣，絕不能忘了他們的犧牲！

English: My name is Fera Jeen Condram Griters, and I am one of the 8 priests of Roentel, the Billlposter Hero. I am teaching the strength of Roentel to his future successors. Are you lost?
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是費拉·吉恩，是爆咒師英雄倫特爾的8位守祭司之一。 我正在向他未來的繼任者傳授倫特爾的力量。你迷路了嗎？

English: You will find your way, and Roentel will guide you.
Traditional_Chinese: 願羅瓦特的力量能與你同在！

English: The Misty Season has begun .
Traditional_Chinese: 今年也是寶兆葡萄酒的豐收節!

English: Have you had Beaujolais? It is the best wine in the world! It tastes just like spring sunshine.
Traditional_Chinese: 知道什麼是寶兆葡萄酒嗎?是一個頂級葡萄酒呢。雖然喝起來不是很好喝，但是他的香味…喔~~是極品啦!

English: I am Enologist Furan. I am in charge of the Madrigal Wine Society.
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫艾魯芝特，是瑪德利賈紅酒協會的負責人。

English: Here, this mysterious wine is call the Blood of the Gods. Remember that!
Traditional_Chinese: 紅酒又稱為神仙的血，一定要記得喔。

English: #b#cff8a004fCome one, come all! Everything you need for the #cfffc0000Guild Siege#nc#nb #b#cff8a004fis right here! Come and get it!#nc#nb
Traditional_Chinese: #b#cff0000ff販賣公會戰所需要的東西喔！#nc#nb

English: *AHEM* Please make sure that you have everything you need for the Guild Siege. I'd hate for you to go in unprepared. Short fights are boring!
Traditional_Chinese: 請準備多一點公會戰時所需要的東西喔。

English: Hello there! I am the Guild Siege Merchant. I'm here to sell any and all goods that our contestants require. If you need anything, just ask!
Traditional_Chinese: 為了販賣公會戰的東西，從很遠的地方來到這裡了。

English: Good luck out there, champ!
Traditional_Chinese: 如果有好消息的話，別忘的也要告訴我喔。

English: Hmmm, no. This is no good. I need more information. I wish someone could help me.
Traditional_Chinese: 可能需要再詳細一點調查啦…嗯…如果有人可以幫我的話再好不過了。

English: Madrigal holds much history, and many secrets, some of which should stay hidden. Don't go sticking your nose where it doesn't belong if you know what's good for ya'.
Traditional_Chinese: 瑪德利賈有太多的秘密了，聽說其中有些秘密絕對不能讓任何人知道...真好笑啊。

English: I am Hachal Gedvas. I was kicked out of the Madrigal History Society. Now I roam the Plain of Bubble in search of Madrigals many secrets.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是在瑪德利賈歷史協會…惹太多麻煩，而被趕出來的歷史學者夏格凱巴。

English: Be careful out there. Watch your step!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你一路順風喔，呵呵呵。

English: Aenn 's Teardrops have helped to deliver peace to this world.
Traditional_Chinese: 阿利安諾！你的眼淚帶來了世界和平！

English: They've gone now, but the lives saved by their sacrifice will be forever remembered.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄的犧牲，保全了這個世界的和平！

English: I am known as Heedan Joe, one of the 8 Priests of Aenn, the Ringmaster hero. It is my duty to deliver the blessings of Aenn to future successors.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是阿利安諾的師弟，提供給繼承人一切所需的資訊！我被稱為海登喬伊，是阿利安諾的 8 位祭司之一，守護者英雄。 將阿利安諾的祝福傳遞給未來的繼任者是我的職責。

English: Aenn will always be with you, my friend.
Traditional_Chinese: 阿利安諾的祝福會帶給你勇氣！

English: You there, do you wish to follow in the footsteps of Curenen, the Jester Hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 操偶師英雄[凱奈]的繼承人啊～你已經準備好走操偶師之路了嗎？

English: What you do from this point forward, is entirely up to you. Whether I help you or not, is also up to you.
Traditional_Chinese: 所有的選擇都在你的掌握之下。

English: Some people admire the Heroes, while some criticize them for their actions. However, regardless of what they did or didn't do, they saved us all and we must be thankful for that.
Traditional_Chinese: 有些人尊敬他…有些人毀謗他…可是他幫了所有的人…

English: I am the Jester Guardian Heingard, the protector of the will of the Jester Hero, Curenen.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是操偶師的守護者[海音卡蘿德]。

English: May the strength of Curenen be with you always.
Traditional_Chinese: 操偶師英雄[凱奈]祝福你…

English: *Ugh* I've got a headache the size of Madrigal!
Traditional_Chinese: *喔呦* 天啊~ 我頭疼到像瑪德利賈大陸一樣大！

English: It is your duty, don't forget that.
Traditional_Chinese: 這就是你的任務。

English: I am so glad to be working in Flarine. There is this strange sound coming that cave over there, though. It sounds like a giant creature of some sort. I'd stay away from there if I were you...
Traditional_Chinese: 我很高興在布拉里斯工作。 不過，那邊的山洞里傳來了奇怪的聲音。 聽起來像是某種巨大的生物。 如果我是你，我會遠離那裡...

English: Well, you certainly are curious, aren't you? I'm Hent, the Acrobat Trainer of Flarine. It's a pleasure to meet you! Say, do you have any aspirin?
Traditional_Chinese: 好吧，你當然很好奇，不是嗎？ 我是涵特，布拉里斯的雜技訓練師。 很高興見到你！ 說吧，你有阿司匹林嗎？

English: Farewell!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你好運！

English: Curenen, hear me now! I wish to follow your will!
Traditional_Chinese: 凱奈啊，英雄啊，要跟隨你的意志啊～

English: There's something you need to do, adventurer.
Traditional_Chinese: 這應該是你要做的事情。

English: The sky wept and the earth trembled when the Heroes began the final battle.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄們進入最後的戰爭了！所以天在哭泣，地也在震啊！

English: As one of the 8 Priests of Altar, I honor the Jester Hero Curenen. My duty is to protect the will of Curenen and to help successors of the Jester Hero realize their dreams.
Traditional_Chinese: 作為祭團的8位守祭司之一，向操偶師英雄庫雷南致敬。 我的職責是保護庫雷南的意志，幫助操偶師英雄的繼承者實現他們的夢想。

English: May the blessing of Curenen be with you always.
Traditional_Chinese: 凱奈會祝福您的…

English: Only the wisdom of Lillip, the Elementor Hero, can save us from certain doom.
Traditional_Chinese: 研術者英雄黎利啊~以你的智慧來保護世界的和平！

English: Eight stars stood strong against those who would seek our demise. At the very last moment, the eight stars shone as one.
Traditional_Chinese: 光明絕不會被黑暗所吞噬！

English: Hello, my name is Horison Keloan, the Elementor Master. I'm a descendant of the very first Elementor Master and my job is to help guide adventurers on the path of Lillip.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是最初研術者首領的後裔，千萬別小看我！

English: Remember the stars, adventurer. Remember the stars.
Traditional_Chinese: 希望你稟持著研術者的韌性，絕對不要認輸！

English: Heren, please spread your heroic presence throughout the world.
Traditional_Chinese: 海琳！請以你的英雄力量庇佑全世界吧！

English: I believe the tears of Rhisis will flow from the sky to wake the Heroes in our time of need.
Traditional_Chinese: 我相信黎席斯的眼淚會從天而降，在我們需要幫助的時候喚醒英雄們。

English: Jeperdy Soce is the name, my child. I'm one the 8 priests of Heren, the Blade Hero. I am delivering the will of Heren to his potential successors.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是8位守祭司之一，暗殺者英雄海琳的師弟！我正在將海琳的遺囑傳達給他的潛在繼任者。

English: May the grace of Heren shine on you, my child.
Traditional_Chinese: 海琳會賜予你最高的祝福！

English: Welcome to Jinitte's Restaurant! I serve the best food in Madrigal!
Traditional_Chinese: 您好！這裡是最高級的料理店，我是卡恩，歡迎你的到來！

English: Greetings, traveler! The Khan Union is quite well known throughout Madrigal for our high quality foods, goods, weapons, and armor. Are you in need of supplies?
Traditional_Chinese: 這瑪德利賈做最高級的料理，你一定要試試才行。

English: My name is Jinitte Khan. I, and my friends here, are all part of the Khan Union. We are traveling nomads who sell our goods to locals.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是在艾音娜特賣食物的傑奴塔！

English: Welcome to Kablloc's Weapon Shop! I carry the best weapons in town!
Traditional_Chinese: 這裡是賣最佳武器的卡布洛防具店。

English: You want to know who I am? Really? Wow, not too many people care to ask who I am... Well then! I'm Kablloc Khan and I'm a nomad!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是在艾音娜特賣武器的[卡布洛]。

English: Do you wish to follow the Ranger Hero, Hynan? Are you ready to undergo the harsh trials to become a Hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 你想跟隨浪人英雄海楠嗎？ 你準備好接受嚴酷的考驗成為英雄了嗎？

English: New life springs forth wherever the seeds are cast. The way to new life has been opened by the Heroes.
Traditional_Chinese: 有他們的犧牲才有這個世界存在，授予英雄的尊稱絕對是當之無愧！

English: I am the Ranger Guardian, Kailreard. It is my duty to protect the will of the Ranger Hero, Hynan.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是浪人的守護者，我的名字是卡伊雷雅德。守護浪人英雄海楠的意志是我的職責。

English: May the glory of Hynan be with you, always.
Traditional_Chinese: 海楠會賜予你祝福的！

English: Only a Knight wielding the strength of Billaon will succeed.
Traditional_Chinese: 騎士英雄畢雷恩啊~你的意志永為人們所懷念！

English: Shade must not be allowed to torment us and our way of life.
Traditional_Chinese: 黑暗離去，光明再現，世界重回和平……

English: My name is Karandur Eope from the Eope family. I am a Knight Master and in charge of leading you to the way of the Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是來自歐佩家族的卡蘭杜，我是騎士大師，負責帶領你走向英雄之路。

English: May the sword of Billaon cut through those who wish to destroy us.
Traditional_Chinese: 畢雷恩的巨劍會賜予與無比的勇氣！

English: This is a terrible location for my shield shop! Why can't I be closer to the mayor?!
Traditional_Chinese: 我正在製作高級的盾...

English: I don't understand why we have to sell our goods over here. We hardly get any customers. Bolpor and Haven have prime locations! It's just not fair!
Traditional_Chinese: 我製作的盾牌是在這世界裡最高級得盾牌啦！沒有一家的盾比得上我的盾牌呢～呵呵…

English: Krinton's the name, and shields are my game. I make the toughest shields in town. I am following in the footsteps of Lucky, the original proprietor of this store.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是盾牌商店的老闆啦～名字叫克林特。嘿嘿...

English: Thank you, come again! But don't expect any discounts...
Traditional_Chinese: 下次再來喔～可是沒有打折啦！哈哈。

English: Mmmm I love the way my flowers smell. So pure and sweet.
Traditional_Chinese: 哈哈哈，今天也開了很多花。

English: What do you think of my flower garden? I've been working on it for a very long time. It's so peaceful here that it's easy to forget all the terrible things going on in the world.
Traditional_Chinese: 對不起喔~~我應該比你多活了200多年呢~你不能以貌取人啦!

English: I am the Great Magician Laola. I may look young, but I am at least 200 years older than you, my child. Never judge a person by their looks. I've had a long life, and many adventures.
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫拉宇。很多人稱我為大魔法師，呵呵呵。不管什麼時候聽，都讓我覺得很驕傲的稱號呢~~呵呵呵。

English: Be careful out there. There are many dangerous creatures around.
Traditional_Chinese: 你要小心啦!看你的前途好像並不是很順利呢。

English: I live for the thrill of the adventure! Woooo!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是風雲啦～流浪的風雲～哈哈

English: Hey, you there! I've got a job for you. No questions, just do it! Hahaha!
Traditional_Chinese: 喂！這是你要做的啦！什麼？你說你為什麼要做喔？嘿嘿…沒有原因啦！反正你要做就是了。

English: The Arrows of the Clown Goddess will fall from the sky and dye the world red. I have foreseen it. What? You're darn right I have a defeatist attitude. Have you seen what Shade can do?
Traditional_Chinese: 弓箭飛到天上，變成雨水從天上降下來…變成滿地紅啊！

English: I'm Leikyen, if you must know. We High-Dwarpets are very different from the normal Dwarpets. However, both Dwarpets and High-Dwarpets are FAR superior to humans such as yourself.
Traditional_Chinese: 像我們這樣的高階杜爾沛跟一般的杜爾沛是不一樣的啦！你說什麼？不管怎樣還是一樣的杜爾沛？你不要給我亂講話喔！我會扁人的。

English: Was it something I said?
Traditional_Chinese: 嘻嘻…你加油吧！

English: Billaon, our Hero. We will follow your spirit.
Traditional_Chinese: 騎士的英雄畢雷恩~我會永遠支持你的！

English: He will smile, and the world will smile back. He is in our thoughts, our dreams, our hopes. He will not fail us, or leave us unprotected. He, is Billaon.
Traditional_Chinese: 他會微笑，世界也會微笑。他在我們的思想、我們的夢想、我們的希望中。 他不會讓我們失望，也不會讓我們不受保護。 他就是畢雷恩。

English: My name is Lobiet Lee and I am one of the 8 priests of Billaon, the Knight Hero. I am here to deliver the will of Billaon to his future successor.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是拉薇特．黎，我是騎士英雄畢雷恩的8位祭司之一。 我來這裡是為了將畢雷恩的遺志傳達給他未來的繼任者。

English: Billaon will be watching over you, always.
Traditional_Chinese: 在畢雷恩的庇佑下，你展現出你最大的勇氣！

English: Oh, I am so sleepy! Do you have a question? Then you should ask me, Pang!
Traditional_Chinese: 好睏喔~有不懂的地方就要問乓喔！

English: Choose what you want to do.
Traditional_Chinese: 想知道什麼呢？

English: Hello this is the place where silly humans visit.
Traditional_Chinese: 哈~在這裡留下你的記錄，之後發生意外，就不用趕那麼多的路了！

English: Hello I am Darkon Pang, the youngest of the Pang brothers. We manage the Lodelights.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是管理生命光柱的[得肯‧乓]

English: Choose the Lodelight where you want to revive.\nIf you want to revive somewhere else, just designate the place. Got it?
Traditional_Chinese: 可以用生命光柱復活\n如果想在其他地方復活也可以喔~

English: Bye! See you soon, after you die that is!
Traditional_Chinese: 慢走喔，下次重生時再見吧！

English: Hello I am Darkon Pang, the youngest of the Pang brothers. We are technically twins but I am still the youngest. We manage the Lodelights.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是管理生命光柱的[得肯‧乓]，其實我們都是雙胞胎耶！哈哈~

English: The soul of Jester hero, Curenen, will protect them.
Traditional_Chinese: 操偶師的英雄凱奈啊～使他們安息吧～

English: They may disappear but they will be victorious And then the world will be saved.
Traditional_Chinese: 他們會消失，可是他們會勝利，而且會救這個世界～

English: I am the Jester Master It is my duty to lead you to the way of the hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我會引導你們到操偶師之路

English: May the blessing of Curenen be with you always.
Traditional_Chinese: 凱奈會祝福您的…

English: Welcome to the #b#cffff0000Darken Quest Office#nc#nb! Looking for work? I may have a job for you...
Traditional_Chinese: 有很多委託任務在等著您喔~等級51以上的玩家請來唷~

English: Welcome to the Quest Office! The local citizens have issued the following quests. Please select the quest you wish to take from the list below.
Traditional_Chinese: 你好~幫你準備的以下的任務喔~

English: My apologies, there are no quests available for an adventurer of your talent and skill at this time.
Traditional_Chinese: 沒有多餘的任務可以提供給你了…下次再來吧!

English: My name is Luriff and I run the Quest Office in Darkon. These quests came from the local citizens and we list them here for you. Are you looking for some work?
Traditional_Chinese: 這裡有很多的委託任務等著你呢~

English: To throw my life into the fire of the red lotus blossom would be spectacular!
Traditional_Chinese: 我把我的生命交給火花裡應該也不錯啦！哈哈。

English: Hmm.. Do you have anything to ask of me?
Traditional_Chinese: 嗯…有什麼話要對我說嗎？

English: I apologize.. but this heat is just too oppressive. I need to lie down for a while. Please see me again when it is cooler.
Traditional_Chinese: 大熱天有人跟我講話的話，我會覺得很煩耶～等天氣涼一點的時候再來找我吧！

English: My name is Nein and refining metal is what I love to do.
Traditional_Chinese: 我這一生喔～只會精鍊東西啦！

English: Good bye. Be careful not to succumb to the oppressive heat.
Traditional_Chinese: 再見啦～外面太陽很大，要小心喔～

English: Do you have anything to ask at #b#cffff0000Office#nc#nb?Then you should visit me, Olien.
Traditional_Chinese: 有問題要問城鎮管理員嗎?那就要找席琳娜喔~

English: Is there anything you can do? Oh ho ho!
Traditional_Chinese: 有你可以做的事嗎? 哈哈

English: Is there something you want to know? I will probably give you the most simple answer so you may just want to think about it on your own. Okay?
Traditional_Chinese: 想知道什麼呢？我會確實回答的，請仔細聽喔！

English: My name is Olien Hengart. I am in charge of managing the Office here in Darken city.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是得肯城鎮管理員席琳娜。

English: Farewell, adventurer.
Traditional_Chinese: 請慢走喔~

English: Offerep, please strengthen this world with your strong spirit.
Traditional_Chinese: 歐布華以無比堅韌的精神悍衛這世界！

English: They will lose everything they love. They will get angry. And they will stand up.
Traditional_Chinese: 就算是失去一切，也要站起來再繼續努力！

English: My name is Pereb Endrile, and I am one the 8 priests of Offerep the Psykeeper hero. I am delivering the spirit of Offerep to his future successor.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是歐布華的師弟，引導他的繼承者走向正途是我的職責！

English: The spirit of Offerep will strengthen you.
Traditional_Chinese: 歐布華會守護著你的！

English: Hey! Hey! I have something good Just take a look!
Traditional_Chinese: 有不錯的東西喔，要不要進來看看~

English: So, what are you going to do for me? Hmmm?
Traditional_Chinese: 有沒有你所需要的？

English: The world has become so dangerous. It was not like this when I was young. Damn! This is why we need shields. Why not buy one?
Traditional_Chinese: 外面的世界太危險了，一定要買些防具才行，你說是吧！

English: Actually I have sold lots of different things in my life, but now I am selling the shields here in Erons Factory. Nice to meet you, my name is Phacham Dudury.
Traditional_Chinese: 事實上，我這輩子賣過很多不同的東西，但現在我在 艾磷胚斯賣盾牌，很高興認識你，我叫葩琴。

English: Bye! Visit me when you come here again! Ha ha ha!
Traditional_Chinese: 再見囉！有什麼需要就再來找我吧！

English: Arise now.. from the darkness. You now bear the shining name - the title of Acrobat!
Traditional_Chinese: 請你從黑暗中清醒吧！偉大的雜技師啊！

English: Here you are. Time to fulfill your duty.
Traditional_Chinese: 這是你的任務啦！

English: Everything is the Acrobat. The Acrobat is everything. Take a moment to ponder what I have said.
Traditional_Chinese: 雜技師是你的所有，你的所有就是雜技師。

English: My name is Pyre and I am the Acrobat Master. Nice to meet you. Ha ha ha I am in charge of helping the vagrants, who want to, become an Acrobat.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是雜技師的老師啦！我的名字是飛蕊，很開心見到你喔～哈哈。

English: Good bye. Never forget the way of the Acrobat. Ha ha ha
Traditional_Chinese: 再見啦～希望你心裡也存在雜技師喔～

English: No one can stop you from jumping into it, even though you know that it is extremely hot.
Traditional_Chinese: 明明知道裡面很熱，可是你還是要進去的話，我也沒辦法啦！

English: Cell
Traditional_Chinese: 飛兒

English: What? What do you want?
Traditional_Chinese: 嗯？找我有事嗎？

English: I know you were here before. I believe you have the ability to overcome the dangers.
Traditional_Chinese: 上次來過的傢伙喔～我覺得你算滿有勇氣的。

English: Speaking to me is already dangerous as it is. What do you want?
Traditional_Chinese: 如果你沒有能力的話，這件事情對你還說，根本就是去送死。

English: Everything is the same. Or is there something special about you? Ha ha Everything is the same.
Traditional_Chinese: 你說什麼？難道你有什麼特別的嗎？

English: You MUST be crazy if you want to know about the mine behind me! If you really wish to enter the mine, talk to Cell. He is somewhere in Darkon.
Traditional_Chinese: 嗯…你好像對我後面的礦山很有興趣喔～難道你想去送死嗎？我建議你還是先去找[飛兒]吧！

English: Oh Cell! He is really a bother. I have written this message for him. Please deliver it to him.
Traditional_Chinese: 啊！飛兒！煩死我了！把這個東西拿去給他吧！

English: Do you want to get the best weapon in Madrigal? Then come here, you will not regret it.
Traditional_Chinese: 想要瑪德利賈最佳武器嗎？到這看看，你一定不會後悔的！

English: Come on, choose one. Which one do you want?
Traditional_Chinese: 有沒有你所需要的？

English: Even though I am very young, many people say that I am the best weapon manufacturer in all of Madrigal.
Traditional_Chinese: 別看我年紀小，我的鍛造技術可是很棒的喔！

English: My name is Remine Crowd, and I run the Weapon Shop here in Darken.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是得肯武器店的[雷米娜]！

English: Please visit me again!
Traditional_Chinese: 歡迎常常來看看喔！

English: Roentel, the seed you sowed in this world will be harvested soundly.
Traditional_Chinese: 羅瓦特！你的祝福會在這世界實現的！！

English: Everything began with them and everything will end with them.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄們一直努力著奮戰，從沒有退縮過！

English: My name is Ride Ropeaedilo, and I am the Billposter Master.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是爆咒師首領，你有何貴幹？

English: I hope the courage of Roentel will be delivered to you.
Traditional_Chinese: 羅瓦特會祝福你的！

English: You, who wants to follow the Ringmaster hero Aenn. Do you believe in the will of the hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 想要追隨守護者英雄阿利安諾的你，你相信英雄的意志嗎？

English: The world will be divided into two factions. Those who follow the heroes and those that follow those who the heroes face.
Traditional_Chinese: 世界一分為二，英雄跟怪物們，各有各的信徒！

English: My name is Romvoette Guardian I am protecting the will of Aenn, the Ringmaster hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是守護者英雄阿利安諾的守護者隆波艾達。

English: The teardrops of Aenn will protect you.
Traditional_Chinese: 阿利安諾會守護你的一切！

English: The best armors are here. I am Rocky the Armor artist.
Traditional_Chinese: 來~來~來~最棒的防具都在這邊！！我是盔甲藝術家文生。

English: Hey! Can you do anything about this?
Traditional_Chinese: 怎樣，這些裝備在別的地方可看不到喔！

English: You have a good eye for great shields. And these are the best.
Traditional_Chinese: 別猶豫啦，被別的客人買走，我也就沒辦法囉！

English: My name is Rocky Forward. I am the Armor Artist that runs this Armor shop! Ha ha ha!
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是文生，我經營這家防具店的盔甲藝術家！ 哈哈哈！再多看看吧，一定有你滿意的東西！

English: Hope to see you soon alive! Ha ha ha!
Traditional_Chinese: 歡迎再來喔！

English: Oh Hynan, I will follow your great will.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄海楠啊～ 賜給我們偉大的力量吧！

English: When night falls and daylight disappears, the heroes will rise.
Traditional_Chinese: 當黑暗與光芒消失的時候，他們就回來拯救這個世界…

English: I am honoring the Ranger hero Hynan as one of the 8 Priests of Altar. I am in charge of passing on the will of the Ranger to you.
Traditional_Chinese: 我尊敬浪人英雄海楠為祭團八位其一的守祭的守祭司，我會引導你們走向浪人之路。

English: May the blessing of Hynan be with you always.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄海楠會祝福您的…

English: You, who want to follow the Blade hero Heren, are you ready to follow the hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 暗殺者英雄海琳的信徒們~你們準備好了嗎?

English: The Clowns will have their amusement. And their amusement will destroy the world.
Traditional_Chinese: 讓怪物恣意在這世界上做亂！絕不允許這種事情發生！

English: My name is Sencyrit Guardian. I am protecting the will of Heren, who is the Blade hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是暗殺者守護者[桑希里特]！

English: Heren will bless you forever.
Traditional_Chinese: 海琳會祝福你的~請放心吧！

English: You, who want to follow the Psykeeper hero Offerep, do you honor the will of hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 念力師英雄歐布華的信徒們啊~你們聽到召喚了嗎？

English: Everything will end like it began.
Traditional_Chinese: 這一切總該有個了結！

English: My name is Shyniff Guardian. I am protecting the will of Offerep, the Psykeeper hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是念力師守護者[夏尼普]。

English: The spirit of Offerep will strengthen your soul.
Traditional_Chinese: 請秉持著歐布華的崇高信念，努力奮鬥下去！

English: Everything you want is here in the Weapon Shop of Stima!
Traditional_Chinese: 你們想要的武器都在司提瑪的商店喔！

English: What would you do for me?
Traditional_Chinese: 有什麼是我可以效勞的？

English: Being a travelling salesman was too hard so I settled here. My shop is still small, but I have a good feeling about this place.
Traditional_Chinese: 生意越來越好，開個分店，這主意不錯吧！

English: My name is Stima Ogonel. I travel from place to place selling weapons. Nice to meet you.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是司提瑪，還請多多指教!

English: It was very nice to meet you. I hope I can see you again.
Traditional_Chinese: 下次再見囉！

English: Are you ready?
Traditional_Chinese: 嫩嫩的見習生！準備好了嗎？

English: It is your duty!
Traditional_Chinese: 這就是你的任務！

English: I am a proud training instructor of Madrigal!
Traditional_Chinese: 第一，我是很光榮的教練！

English: I am here to show vagrants the way.
Traditional_Chinese: 身為訓練教官，我會引導你們成長之路。

English: Attention! Salute!
Traditional_Chinese: 立正！敬禮！飛行！

English: You, who want to become the successor of the Elementor hero Lillip, do you believe in the will of the hero?
Traditional_Chinese: 研術者黎利的信眾們~該是你們挺身而出的時候了！

English: You will be one of the 8 that watch the stars for a sign of their arrival.
Traditional_Chinese: 戰爭的煙火，遮蓋住星星的光芒……

English: My name is Wendien Guardian. I am protecting the will of Lillip, the Elementor hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是研術者守護者[文嫡凌]。

English: You will be enlightened with the wisdom of Lillip.
Traditional_Chinese: 歡迎你們來到這裡！

English: You will be enlightened with the wisdom of Lillip.
Traditional_Chinese: 歡迎你們來到這裡！

English: A piece of advice? A Mercenary's weapon is their livelihood. You must dedicate your life to the blade, and in turn, it will protect you.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果想要得到自己想要的東西，那就要有所付出。請記住這一點喔。

English: Hello, I'm Andy Kimu, the Mercenary Master of Flarine. The pay is good, but they make me wear this ridiculous looking robe. It's so itchy! I stroke my beard all day just to keep my mind off of it.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是布拉里斯專業的轉職幫手安迪凱，擔任勇者的轉職。雖然進入這個行業沒有很久，但是我會盡力而為的。

English: Rhisis will be with you, always, young one.
Traditional_Chinese: 年輕的黎席斯將永遠和你在一起。

English: Hmm Aha! Why not ask the vagrants? Maybe they can handle this.
Traditional_Chinese: 嗯.. 啊!你去拜託其他冒險者如何?那些人應該可以幫你解決問題的。

English: Merry Christmas! I hope everything goes well this time!
Traditional_Chinese: 希望今年的聖誕節會幸福喔，Happy 聖誕!!

English: My name is Saint Aramy and I am one of the Santa's in the Madrigal Christmas Society. Nice to meet you
Traditional_Chinese: 我是擔任瑪德利賈聖誕協會的聖誕老公公聖音特亞羅梅。歡迎啊~

English: Hey! Merry Christmas!
Traditional_Chinese: 喔耶！聖誕快樂~

English: Hmm It is very hard to track Noie's Planet in the Amedus galaxy. Maybe I have to use the chaos theory.
Traditional_Chinese: 天上的星星數都數不清，如果用混沌理論來說明，會不會比較容易了解！

English: *Hmmm... carry the two, divide by zero, and subtract the square root of fourte... Wait a minute. Divide by zero? That's impossible! This would be so much easier if I had more than just this flimsy abacus.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄的犧牲，也讓世人全都清醒過來！

English: Hi there! My name is Ata Milleniut and I am learning Astronomy from Noie, my mentor. Hey, do you think you could analyze this fractal curve?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是諾也的師弟，興趣是研究天文學。

English: Argh! Where was I? Distractions...
Traditional_Chinese: 沒其他事情的話，那我去忙喔~這曲線的角度是……

English: Brothers! What should I do? Huh? Christmas.. Christmas will be Ruined!
Traditional_Chinese: 兄弟們!該怎麼辦呢?嗯?如果這樣下去的話.聖誕節就..嗚嗚嗚..

English: I hope you have a wonderful Christmas!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你有個美好的聖誕節！

English: My name is Saint Atto and I am one of the Santa's in the Madrigal Christmas Society. Nice to meet you
Traditional_Chinese: 我是擔任瑪德利賈聖誕協會的聖誕老公公聖音特亞妥。歡迎啊~

English: Merry Christmas! Merry Christmas!
Traditional_Chinese: 聖誕快樂~~聖誕快樂~~

English: The perfect shields of the Bobo family are only here, in the Shield Shop of Boboku!
Traditional_Chinese: 名牌防具!!全都在波弟防具店！

English: What should I ask you to do?
Traditional_Chinese: 有我能夠幫忙的嗎？

English: You won't find a better armor selection in all of Flaris, I'll guarantee you that!
Traditional_Chinese: 製作防具的方法？這個不行，我們波家的秘密絕不外傳！

English: Who am I? You must be joking. I'm only the most famous armorer in Flarine! I'm Boboko Bobo and I run the Bobo family Armor Shop for new Mercenaries, Acrobats and Assists.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是誰？ 你一定是在開玩笑。我只是在布拉里斯經營防具店的波弟，我哥哥在賣武器，你也可以順便看看！

English: Tell your friends buy Bobo Family Equipment!
Traditional_Chinese: 有穿戴我波弟的防具在身，包你刀槍不入！

English: Your weapon is looking a little dull there, friend. Thank Rhisis for you, I buy and sell weapons!
Traditional_Chinese: 朋友，你的武器看起來有點鈍。 謝謝黎席斯，我買賣武器！

English: Here you are. Please solve this as soon as possible.
Traditional_Chinese: 這有點難以啟齒，有這些事情想找人幫幫忙！

English: *sighs* Oh, sorry! I was daydreaming about Julia over there. She's so amazing! Hey, do you think a girl like her and a guy like me could ever be? What? How could she resist me?!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是波家的老大，已經到了該結婚的年齡，喬艾倫是我喜歡的對象！她真是漂亮~

English: Greetings from the Bobo Family, stranger! I am Boboku Bobo. I run the Weapon Shop here in Flarine. Have a look around and don't forget to visit my brother's shops!
Traditional_Chinese: 來自波波家族的問候，陌生人！ 我是在布拉里斯經營武器店的波哥。 四處看看，別忘了去我哥哥的商店看看！

English: Thanks for stopping by! Tell Julia I said hello!
Traditional_Chinese: 想要武器裝備，請找我們兄弟倆就行啦！

English: Do not worry, where there is a will, there is a way.
Traditional_Chinese: 大哥，不要擔心啦，一定有辦法的。小弟啊~沒什麼好辦法嗎?

English: Have you been a very good boy this year? Then you should be rewarded with a big present Ha ha ha
Traditional_Chinese: 今年也做了很多善事嗎?那一定可以得到好的禮物囉，哈哈。

English: My name is Saint Buruto and I am one of the Santa's in the Madrigal Christmas Society. Nice to meet you
Traditional_Chinese: 我是擔任瑪德利賈聖誕協會的聖誕老公公聖音特布魯陀。

English: Ha ha ha! Merry Christmas!
Traditional_Chinese: 呵呵呵!聖誕快樂!

English: Mommy, I am hungry.
Traditional_Chinese: 媽媽，我肚子好餓喔。

English: I moved here with my father I do not have citizenship yet, but I will very soon.
Traditional_Chinese: 這次跟隨爸爸搬到這裡來了。雖然還沒拿到居留證，可是過不久就可以拿到了。

English: My name is ChiChi Horis, and this is my father Paul Horis.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是潘赫里斯的女兒姬姬赫里斯。

English: Good bye
Traditional_Chinese: 再見囉~

English: The new year has come!
Traditional_Chinese: 燕子的新年是昨天~~

English: How strange, I cannot remember the Happy New Year song.
Traditional_Chinese: 心情怪怪的，想不到歌詞。

English: Happy new year!
Traditional_Chinese: 新年快樂!

English: New year has come!
Traditional_Chinese: 新買來的鞋子也是我的

English: You will be happy with the leader of the chorus. That is me! My name is Monaco.
Traditional_Chinese: 與合唱團摸拿柯在一起的話，活力旺盛呢~

English: New year has come!
Traditional_Chinese: 新買來的鞋子也是我的

English: How strange I do not remember the Happy New Year song.
Traditional_Chinese: 啊，真是的!忘記唱到哪裡了啦，好煩喔。差一點害我心情不好。

English: New year has come!
Traditional_Chinese: 新買來的鞋子也是我的

English: How strange, I do not remember the Happy New Year song.
Traditional_Chinese: 喂.. 不要誤會喔，可以告訴我一下後面的歌詞嗎?

English: Trust in Aenn, and your path shall be lit with the light of a thousand candles.
Traditional_Chinese: 相信阿利安諾，你的道路將被一千支蠟燭照亮。

English: The Heroes sacrificed themselves to defeat Shade, but she will one day return. We must prepare.
Traditional_Chinese: 決定命運的時刻，終於來臨！

English: My name is Clamb Cobonet, the Ringmaster Wise Man. I am here to preserve the legacy of Aenn, the Ringmaster Hero and to light the path for those that wish to follow in Aenn's footsteps. Have faith, young one, Aenn watches over you.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是可伯內特，守護者賢者，我來這裡是為了保護守護者英雄 阿利安諾的遺志，並為那些希望追隨阿利安諾腳步的人照亮道路。

English: Follow the path of Aenn, and you will never be forgotten.
Traditional_Chinese: 跟隨阿利安諾的道路，你將永遠不會被遺忘。

English: Bubble watches over all aspiring heroes.
Traditional_Chinese: 好好加油！一切順利囉！

English: The shields of the Heroes have defended Madrigal from the wrath of Shade. We are forever grateful for their bravery and wish to preserve their memory for all time.
Traditional_Chinese: 就算結果有所不同，但所要經歷的考驗是相同的！

English: My name is Cuarine Coexar and I am the Psykeeper Wise Man. I preserve the history of the Heroes and provide guidance for those wishing to follow the path Offerep, the Psykeeper Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是念力師賢者[可林]！

English: Follow the path of the Heroes, and you will never lose your way.
Traditional_Chinese: 念力師的象徵就是擁有堅強的精神信念！

English: A strange energy emanates from this fountain. What is it?
Traditional_Chinese: 一樣耶~真的一模一樣耶！你真的是太厲害了！

English: We lie in wait, preparing for the worst, and hoping for a future to come when the heroes will arise once more.
Traditional_Chinese: 他們一定能會成為真正的英雄！

English: My name is Cuzrill Rembright and I am the Elementor Wise Man. I preserve the history of the Heroes and provide guidance for those wishing to follow the path Lillip, the Elementor Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是研術者賢者[可滋利]。

English: Trust in the legacy of the Heroes, adventurer. For it is all that can save us now.
Traditional_Chinese: 充滿智慧的人一定都向黎利所看齊

English: Welcome to #b#cff0000ffDior Station#nc#nb! You can find #b#cffff0000flying information#nc#nb here.
Traditional_Chinese: 這裡是提供飛行情報的寶雅飛行器具店。

English: Please, if you can help me, I will be in your debt.
Traditional_Chinese: 請好好聽我說喔！

English: My family has managed the Flarine Station for generations. I am proud to continue that tradition.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的家族世代管理布拉里斯站。 我很自豪能夠延續這項傳統。

English: My name is Dior Christin. I've lived in Flarine all my life and I love this place. Look at me, I can't stop bouncing! Anyway, I manage the station here so let me know if you have any questions!
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字叫寶雅．克莉絲汀。 我一生都住在布拉里斯，我非常喜歡這個地方。看著我，我總是雀躍不已！無論如何，我在這經營航空站，如果您有任何問題，請告訴我！

English: 1. First, you'll need to buy a broom or a board and be at least level 20 in order to fly\n 2. Next, double-click the board or broom in your inventory or simply move it to a hot key to climb aboard.
Traditional_Chinese: 1.在飛行器具站可購買各種飛行道具\n2.使用物品欄的的飛行道具就可以飛行

English: 3. Press the Space Bar to accelerate your flying vehicle. Press the Space Bar key again while moving to stop. Think of the accelerator like a toggle button for *Go* and *Stop*.
Traditional_Chinese: 3.按空白鍵開始加速飛行器。移動時再次按下空白鍵就會停下。將按鍵想像為加速與停止的切換按鈕。

English: 4. To navigate, you can simply hold the Right Mouse Button down and angle the camera in the direction that you want to go.\n Alternatively, you can also use the W, A, S and D controls to turn.
Traditional_Chinese: 4.按著滑鼠右鍵就可以調整方向。\n另外使用鍵盤W、S、A、D也可以操作。

English: 5. Additionally, you can simply tap the Right Mouse Button twice to lock the camera to the mouse pointer. This allows you to navigate without holding down the right mouse button. Clicking twice again will turn off this effect.
Traditional_Chinese: 5.此外，您只需要點擊滑鼠右鍵兩次即可將相機鎖定在鼠標上。這允許您在不按住滑鼠右鍵的情況下導航。再次點擊右鍵兩次即可關閉效果。

English: 6. Anyone can fly in Madrigal. You simply have to acquire a flying vehicle!\n 7. There are numerous makes and models of flying vehicles. Trying shopping around in player shops or click the Use Premium Item Shop icon next to the Start Button.
Traditional_Chinese: 6.任何人都可以在瑪德利賈飛行。你只需要獲得一輛飛行器。\n7.飛行器有許多品牌跟型號。嘗試在玩家商店購物或使用高級物品商店購入。

English: I hope the information I gave you was helpful. You're on your own now, aviator! See you in the clouds!
Traditional_Chinese: 以上是基本的飛行介紹，剩下的就靠你自己了，雲端上見吧！

English: 1. Occasionally, you will run into some pesky masquerpets while flying. You will see a red box surrounding them.
Traditional_Chinese: 1.偶爾，你會在飛行中遇到討厭的魔域怪物。與怪物的達到一定的距離，怪物周圍就會顯示攻擊方格。

English: 2. You can target these creatures with the Left Mouse Button. If you lose sight of them while flying, a green arrow appears on the edge of the screen to indicate which direction you need to turn.
Traditional_Chinese: 2.可以按下點選滑鼠左鍵來鎖定怪物。如果飛行時看不到它們，螢幕邊緣會出現綠色箭頭，會指示您需要轉向哪個方向。

English: 3. To attack the creature, simply get as close as you can and press the Left Mouse Button or the Insert Key.\n 4. If you want to follow the monster automatically, press the Z Key.
Traditional_Chinese: 3.要攻擊鎖定的怪物，只需要可能地靠近，並按下"Insert"或選滑鼠左鍵。\n4.按下"z"則可以自動跟隨目標。

English: 5. Magicians and Acrobats can shoot from range while in the air. Mercenaries and Assists must rely on melee attacks. You can also use your skills!
Traditional_Chinese: 5.魔法師跟雜技師可以在空中遠程射擊。勇者跟神職者必須依靠近戰攻擊。你也可以使用你的技能！

English: 6. When you destroy a flying masquerpet, any dropped loot will be placed into your inventory automatically. If there is no room in your inventory, the loot is lost, so be careful!
Traditional_Chinese: 6.當你打倒飛行的魔域怪物時，任何掉落的戰利品都會自動放入你的背包中。如果你的背包中沒有空間，戰利品就會消失，所以要注意！

English: 7. That about covers it for your flying combat training, cadet! Just one more thing... Don't crash and burn! Hahaha, just a little pilot humor.
Traditional_Chinese: 7.學員，關於你的飛行戰鬥訓練，還有一件事情…不要崩潰跟太過頭！哈哈哈，這只是一點點飛行員的幽默。

English: Have fun out there and be safe! Don't forget to check your six!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝您冒險愉快！別忘了確認第六項！

English: Goodbye, adventurer! Feel free to stop by again if you have any questions about flying.
Traditional_Chinese: 再見了，冒險者！如果您對飛行還有任何疑問，請隨時再次光臨。

English: Why do we all have to wear the same outfit?
Traditional_Chinese: 沒有其他地方比這更適合我的，你說是吧！

English: Rhisis created the three Clown Gods; Shade, Iblis and Bubble and bestowed each of them with a different aspect of herself. Shade, infused with the Fear and Rage of Rhisis, nearly destroy our original home, Roika.
Traditional_Chinese: 黎席斯創造了三個小丑神； 史瑞德、伊普里司 和 波布爾 賦予他們每個人不同的一面。 充滿黎席斯的恐懼和憤怒的陰影幾乎摧毀了我們原來的家，依普利斯。

English: I am Domek Ilujian, the Billposter Wise Man. I am here to record the history of the Billposter Hero, Roentel, and educate travelers on Madrigal's rich history.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是爆咒師賢者[德邁洛．詹]。

English: Farewell, traveler. If we do not learn from our past, we are doomed to repeat it.
Traditional_Chinese: 人因夢想而偉大……

English: #b#cff8a004fCheck in here to review the weekly results of the #cfffc0000Guild Siege!#nc#nb
Traditional_Chinese: #b#cff0000ff想知道對戰的結果嗎?我會引導你的。#nc#nb

English: Only the most cunning of guilds can hope to achieve victory in the Guild Sieges. Are you ready for the challenge?
Traditional_Chinese: 您的勇氣與智慧，將引導您的公會走向勝利之路。

English: Hello, it's very nice to meet you! I am the Rewards Manager for the Guild Siege Center. I can reward prize money, return application fees, or even show you this week's ranking for the Guild Siege.
Traditional_Chinese: 我擔任引導公會的事項，管理付支獎金、歸還申請金、排行的相關事情。

English: Good luck to you! I hope I see you on the ranking charts!
Traditional_Chinese: 希望參加對戰的每個公會，好運旺旺來。

English: Madrigal's ecosystem is truly fascinating! The more you discover, the greater the mystery!
Traditional_Chinese: 瑪德利賈的生態界越是研究越覺得神奇！

English: Researching Madrigal's vast ecosystem, particularly that of the Masquerpets, is very rewarding. I get to work outdoors, and examine all of the strange creatures created by the Clown Goddess of Fear and Rage, Shade.
Traditional_Chinese: 像時空毀滅者的魔域怪，就需要花很多時間去研究。

English: My name is Dr. Estly and I am studying Madrigal's Ecosystem with my 2 brothers. Have you ever heard of Clockworks? He is the most amazing creature I have ever had the chance to study! Very, very dangerous, though.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是Dr.法小林與2個哥哥研究瑪德利賈的生態！

English: Thanks for stopping by, friend. Let me know if you ever need any information on a specific creature.
Traditional_Chinese: 想知道魔域怪的知識，隨時來找我吧~

English: Assists are way better than Mercenaries! Quiet Mustang! *chuckles* Hey you, c'mere if you want to learn about Assists!
Traditional_Chinese: 不一定要幫助別人，首先要幫助自己，如果連自己都幫不好了，那要如何幫助其他人啊!!

English: What is that crazy Mustang babbling about now... Ah, no matter. Every party needs an Assist. Any schmuck can wack a monster in the head, but we can do that AND play a support role! Do you like popularity? Than this is the job for you!
Traditional_Chinese: 我.. 為了成為神職者走了很漫長的路。希望你也走這樣的路。這個才是真正成為神職者的路程。

English: I am Captain Elic Eward of the Madrigal Job Training Center. If you want to become an Assist, I can help you.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是瑪德利賈的訓練教官艾里維得。如果想成為神職者的話，請來找我，我一定會幫你成為真正的神職者。

English: Remember, every party needs an Assist! Don't leave home without us!
Traditional_Chinese: 不要忘記幫助自己這句話，加油!

English: Yay! I am so happy! Bubble smiles on us!
Traditional_Chinese: 我好高興喔~

English: I may not look like much, but I'm very powerful. I'm ready for anything! The Soldiers of Kion will prevail!
Traditional_Chinese: 潘不大能相信陌生人，你可別見怪！

English: My name is Eoners Archer and I am one of the hired soldiers of Kion. We are here to protect the citizens of Flarine, as long as the money is right. \n*wink*
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是「恩內爾思」，我是凱英的僱傭兵之一。 只要錢到位，我們就會在這保護所有布拉里斯的公民。*眨眼*

English: Love to Kion!!
Traditional_Chinese: 為了傭兵團的光榮勝利！

English: Welcome to Flarine! Please, enjoy your stay!
Traditional_Chinese: 布拉里斯的市民們，一切都會順利的，一切都會順利..

English: Flarine is the capital city of Madrigal. It may be a small city, but it's certainly the most beautiful. Feel free to come see me if you ever need anything.
Traditional_Chinese: 布拉里斯是瑪德利賈的首府。 它可能是一個小城市，但它肯定是最美麗的。 如果您需要任何東西，請隨時來找我。

English: I am the mayor of Flarine. The well-being of the citizens is my highest priority. Is there anything I can help you with?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是布拉里斯的市長，公民的福祉是我的首要任務。 有什麼我可以幫助您的嗎？

English: #b#cff8a004fWe have a #cfffc0000Guild Siege #b#cff8a004fevery Saturday. Speak to the Guild Siege Managers for more information!#nc#nb
Traditional_Chinese: 為了布拉里斯加油!

English: *scribbles* Ah, yes! This is good stuff... I'm such a great writer! Now I just need a good protagonist...
Traditional_Chinese: 這次小說的題材就用這個吧.. 這個要怎麼寫呢..嗯..

English: I am writing one of my best novels yet! It's action-packed, fast paced, dark, and even a little scary! It's about this hero who enters a dark cave and... well wait, if I tell you, you might steal my idea! Who are you anyway!?
Traditional_Chinese: 小說呢..要為了大眾而寫的，雖然會有點刺激，但是只要有趣就行了，知道了嗎?

English: Pleased to meet you! My name is Gergantes Hambert. I live here in Flarine and I love it. I am a famous novelist as well as the Chairman of the Publication Society. Do you like to read?
Traditional_Chinese: 很高興認識你！ 我的名字是凱樂帝函特。 我住在布拉里斯，我喜歡這裡。 我是一位著名的小說家，也是出版協會的主席。 你喜歡讀書嗎？

English: My next novel will be a best seller, I'm sure! Keep an eye out for it!
Traditional_Chinese: 請期待我的下一個作品吧!絕對不會讓你失望的，呵呵呵

English: We, the Soldiers of Kion, are family!
Traditional_Chinese: 我們是吉翁傭兵團！

English: Don't speak to me as if you know me, stranger. I am the most feared martial artist in all of Madrigal. I can take you down with one finger!
Traditional_Chinese: 我一定會把羅瓦特的技藝給發揚光大的！

English: My name is Ghalade Elore, if you must know. I am one of the hired Kion Soldiers for Flarine. I am a legend in the world of martial arts, as I've followed in the footsteps of Roentel. Don't cross me.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果你一定要知道的話，我叫加拉德‧艾洛爾。 我是布拉里斯僱用的傭兵團士兵之一。 我是武術界的傳奇人物，因為我跟隨了倫特爾的腳步。 別惹我。

English: Glory to Kion
Traditional_Chinese: 為傭兵團的光榮而戰！

English: Tucani! Would you PLEASE stop singing that stupid song? I have a headache...
Traditional_Chinese: 使用黎席斯的氣息，使你的精神與肉體感到穩定。黎席斯的眼淚沾濕了全身，死亡的人也會重新起來。

English: Humans look down us because we used to do their work for them. But as 'smart' as humans may be, we are far stronger. We are by no means, inferior. Understand?
Traditional_Chinese: 因為我們幫助人類做很多事情，所以很多人好像瞧不起我們吧。那是因為人類只有力量而沒有大腦的關係啦，不是我們自私的關係，知道嗎?

English: Yeah, not gonna happen. If you didn't already figure it out, we don't particularly like you people. So unless you have some sort of business to discuss, I suggest you leave. Now.
Traditional_Chinese: 算了吧!只因為人類要知道關於我的事情，所以讓我覺得很厭煩，所以滾開好嗎?

English: It's about time you left...
Traditional_Chinese: 沒事的話不要隨便跟我講話!有事也是一樣啦!不要跟我說話。

English: Only the bravest of adventurers should dare to enter. Are you prepared?
Traditional_Chinese: 正在等待你們的冒險，有勇氣的人們過來吧。

English: You are brave, young one. Go with honor.
Traditional_Chinese: 等你們的順序吧，考驗還沒結束。

English: If you have any doubts whatsoever, you should just quit now. Too much blood has been spilled already over all of this.
Traditional_Chinese: 沒有勇氣的人啊，不要想來這個地方。如果覺得你們的生命是可貴的..

English: You are indeed foolish if you think you can go in there alone. You must bring friends if you wish to have a even a small chance at victory.
Traditional_Chinese: 太無知了。一個人是無法對付的.. 所以我不能放你進去。

English: You are not yet ready to challenge the beast within this lair. You are foolish if you think I would allow you to enter.
Traditional_Chinese: 想要挑戰的人們，你們還沒得到挑戰的資格， 去布拉里斯的挪斯布看看吧。

English: Travel to Northern Flarine and speak with the Novelist there. I cannot help you.
Traditional_Chinese: 前往北布拉里斯並與那裡的小說家交談。 我幫不了你。

English: No, not yet. You are not qualified to challenge this creature yet. Now please, leave in peace.
Traditional_Chinese: 不夠啊，不夠。要向他們挑戰的能力，對你們來說還不夠啊..

English: So you want to know who I am, my child? I exist... and yet, I do not exist. That is all you need to know and I will tell you no more.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的存在對你來說並不重要……

English: Farewell, brave one.
Traditional_Chinese: 再見了！有勇氣的人們！

English: Worry not, Hormes. We will not fail.
Traditional_Chinese: 別再抱怨啦~我們的努力可沒白費！

English: It's hard to interpret the ancient texts. They are extremely old and in poor condition. What we have discerned, is that the fight for peace is far from over, and we must prepare ourselves for what's coming.
Traditional_Chinese: 光明不會永被黑暗所籠罩……

English: My name is Guabrill Elldoradin, the Blade Wise Man. We've all come together to guide to adventurer's such as your self on the path of the Heroes. Will you stand up for Madrigal, young one?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是暗殺者賢者[加布里]。

English: The Heroes will never be forgotten. Stories of their sacrifice will be told for generations to come.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄的偉大事蹟，任誰都無法遺忘的。

English: #b#cff8a004fWelcome, competitors! The #cfff60000Guild Siege Application Center #cff8a004fis open for business!#nc#nb
Traditional_Chinese: #b#cff0000ff自認為最強的人都看過來#cfff60000公會戰#cff8a004f等你來挑戰。#nc#nb

English: If your guild has reached the point where you think you have the strength and numbers to compete against another guild, then you’re in the right place. Prove to everyone that you’re able to become a legend like Badza!
Traditional_Chinese: 想不想比試一下你們的勇氣與智慧呢？看誰才是最強的！

English: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am the Guild Siege Master of Flarine. Speak with me if you need general Guild Siege information, want to apply, form your party, or enter the arena.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是管理公會歸還公所的人，想申請公會戰與入場的話，來找我就對了。

English: For Glory!
Traditional_Chinese: 為了公會的名譽，加油!

English: I smell human... gross!
Traditional_Chinese: 打亂黎席斯的意志力與詛咒，要把所有的東西毀滅掉。

English: We are superior to humans in all ways. You're lucky I'm even speaking to you. Now, what is it you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Traditional_Chinese: 我們種族比人類還要靈活呢。當然囉，雖然你們不是很想承認。但，這是事實啊~不是嗎?

English: Who wants to know? You? Haha! Right, like I owe you anything at all, human. Why don't you make like a tree, and get out of here?
Traditional_Chinese: 我要開始禁止發言了，我不喜歡人類對我產生好奇心。我絕對不會說的，知道嗎?

English: Thanks for leaving, chump!
Traditional_Chinese: 啊..好煩啊..我也該退出做這種事情了..哎呀..

English: So you want to know who I am, my child? I exist... and yet, I do not exist. That is all you need to know and I will tell you no more.
Traditional_Chinese: 我的存在對你來說並不重要……

English: Shade will return, this much is certain. We can only hope to be ready for her.
Traditional_Chinese: 不要想要認識我!我是存在 有時又不存在…

English: We await the day of our impending doom. The day will come, and pass. We must stand together.
Traditional_Chinese: 光明再現，所有的黑暗將無法遁藏！

English: My name is Hormes Kudo, the Knight Wise Man. I lead those who wish to become a Knight successor, and I help to preserve the memory of the Heroes.
Traditional_Chinese: 我手抓獨眼蝙蝠，口咬海鮮餅，腳踏幻影滑板！

English: Rhisis watch over you.
Traditional_Chinese: 黎席斯守護著你。

English: Draw your weapon and cut down everything that stands in your way! A Mercenary fears nothing!
Traditional_Chinese: 把劍拿起來，砍掉眼前所有的東西!然後再前進吧!勇者啊!

English: The three most important things for a successful Mercenary are instinct, courage, and level headedness. If you possess these qualities, then you have what it takes to be a Mercenary.
Traditional_Chinese: 對勇者最重要的是慎思，正確，快速。擁有這3種東西時，你就可以成為真正的勇者了。

English: Hello, my friend. It is my pleasure to make your acquaintance. My name is Hyuit Jenive and I am a sergeant of the Madrigal Job Training Center. I help train Vagrants to become Mercenaries, after Mustang signs off on them, of course.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是瑪德利賈世界的訓練教官輝里傑。我會協助你們成為真正的勇者，加油!

English: Keep your pride, courage and hope!
Traditional_Chinese: 千萬不要忘了勇氣與鬥志！

English: Welcome! If you need any help or information, please don't hesitate to ask.
Traditional_Chinese: 有什麼疑問嗎?那就問我吧，我會幫你解答的。

English: Hi there, I have a quest for you!
Traditional_Chinese: 那邊那一位，我有任務要交給你！

English: Welcome to Madrigal. You look lost! Is there anything I can help you with?
Traditional_Chinese: 你好嗎?有什麼要幫忙的嗎?

English: I am Is, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or my twin sisters!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是 「艾絲」，我是 布拉里斯鎮 的嚮導之一。 如果您需要任何幫助或信息，可以找我或者詢問我的雙胞胎姐妹！

English: There are several of us throughout Flarine and we all look alike so try not to get confused, tee hee! We confuse ourselves sometimes so it's alright if you do.
Traditional_Chinese: 有到城鎮晃一圈嗎?應該看到了很多長的跟我很像的解說員吧!

English: Anyway, stop by and see me anytime if you need any help or information. That's what we're all here for!
Traditional_Chinese: 哈哈，混亂吧?一定的啦。有的時候連我們自己都會覺得很混亂呢。祝你一路順風喔~

English: Flarine is the most beautiful city in Madrigal, in my humble opinion. It's always spring here and I love it. Just be careful of all the Masquerpets outside the city.
Traditional_Chinese: 布拉里斯是一個很溫暖的地方。雖然看起來很溫暖，但是在外面有很多恐怖的怪物住在各地區喔~所以要小心啊。

English: If you're going to explore the wilds of Flaris, make sure you stock up on supplies from one of our many vendors here before you leave.
Traditional_Chinese: 確保你在我們所有攤販這裡得到你所需要的支援之後，再到野外探索吧

English: There are many shops in the city that sell everything from food and drink, to weapons and armor. Have a look around to see what we have available!
Traditional_Chinese: 都市裡有很多商店，比較特別的建築物前面，都會有很多商人在吵著販賣自製物品喔~

English: You can also purchase exotic items from the many private shops in the area. These shops are usually run by other adventurers, such as yourself.
Traditional_Chinese: 每個商店所販售的物品不同，所以一定要知道他們所賣的物品，這樣的話在購買物品的時候，比較減省時間喔~

English: People from all over Madrigal visit this city every day to shop and enjoy the sights. It is so beautiful here. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Traditional_Chinese: 啊，對了!如果要到遠的地方的話，請準備多一點物品，一定要記住喔~

English: If your Health Points (HP) reach zero, you will die. Not to worry, though, you have several options when this happens.
Traditional_Chinese: 體力(HP)完全消失的話，在戰鬥的時候會暈倒，所以隨時要注意自己的體力喔。

English: If you select Lodestar, you will be summoned back to town and resurrected. Alternatively, players who've chosen the Assist Job can often resurrect you where you died.
Traditional_Chinese: 如果你選擇生命光柱，你將被傳送回城鎮並復活。或者由神職者職業的玩家在你倒下的地方復活你。

English: In addition to this, you can also purchase a Scroll of Resurrection by selecting the Premium Item Shop icon on your task bar. This allows you to resurrect in place.
Traditional_Chinese: 也會恢復暈倒的人。但是，你在生命光柱指定了復活點的話，會在生命光柱復活喔~

English: Goodbye, adventurer. Enjoy your stay in Flarine!
Traditional_Chinese: 祝你有一個快樂的冒險旅程。

English: I am Iske Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. I also run a beauty shop. If you need any help or information, just ask me or my twin sisters!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是伊斯克‧特里尼蒂，是布拉里斯城的嚮導之一。 我還經營一家美容店。 如果您需要任何幫助或信息，請詢問我或我的雙胞胎姐妹！

English: My name is Ismerelda Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Traditional_Chinese: 我叫伊斯梅拉達‧特里尼蒂，是布拉里斯城的嚮導之一。 如果您需要任何幫助或訊息，可詢問我或我的雙胞胎姐妹！

English: I am Ispim Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是布拉里斯市的解說員因斯萍，如果您需要任何幫助或資訊，請詢問我或我的雙胞胎姐妹！

English: I am Isruel Trinity, and I am one of the guides in Flarine City. If you need any help or information, just ask me or one of my twin sisters!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是伊斯魯爾‧特里尼蒂，是布拉里斯城的嚮導之一。 如果您需要任何幫助或訊息，可詢問我或我的雙胞胎姐妹！

English: *sigh* I miss Kimberly so much. I can barely focus on my duties...
Traditional_Chinese: 奇怪，今天又哪裡壞掉了呢？我好想念金貝勒喔……

English: Would you do me a favor, please?
Traditional_Chinese: 能幫我個忙嗎?

English: Ugh, I still get so many complaints about the machines I sold to Saint City and Darken City. I may have used substandard building materials from the Dekane Mine. Ah well...
Traditional_Chinese: 最近聽說在聖音特和得肯賣的機器一直故障，但還找不出原因……

English: My name is Jeff Prosis and I am the Machine Developer of Flarine. Kimberley, my wife, is a guide in Saint City.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是布拉里斯開發負責研究員傑夫，在聖音特的解說員金貝勒是我的老婆啦！

English: Say hello to my wife, Kimberly, in Saint City if you happen to see her, will you?
Traditional_Chinese: 下次再跟我說說其他的故事，再見囉！

English: Iblis above! Ddukguk has disappeared! Oh, what should I do now. Please, somebody help me!!!
Traditional_Chinese: 年糕湯..年糕湯不見了..啊，我以後要怎麼辦啊!有誰可以幫我啊!

English: I have wanted to be a cook since I was a child and now, in my old age, I can finally live my dream. I have never been more happy.
Traditional_Chinese: 因為熱愛料理，所以在這把年紀開始作料哩，從來沒有這麼幸福的時候，哈哈哈。

English: My name is Juglin Girliart and I am helping Losha cook.
Traditional_Chinese: 我在這裡菈菈安，是幫助蘿夏的實習生，叫做 笛林亞特。

English: Happy New Year!
Traditional_Chinese: 新年快樂!

English: Welcome to the #b#cffff0000Office#nc#nb of Flarine. How can I be of service?
Traditional_Chinese: 城鎮服務員會提供給你一些需要的情報 需要就歡迎你來喔~

English: So what can you do for me, huh?
Traditional_Chinese: 要幫忙什麼呢？

English: *Sigh* Boboku is so manly, strong and kind. But I could never date him because his belly is too big!
Traditional_Chinese: 波哥人很好又有男人味，不過他的啤酒肚實在太大了！

English: My name is Julia Trinity and I manage the Office of Flarine. How can I help you today?
Traditional_Chinese: 我是布拉里斯城鎮服務員喬艾倫，請多多指教喔！

English: Spread the blessing of Rhisis throughout Madrigal! Sprinkle the tears of Rhisis upon the ground. Welcome to the club, Assist!
Traditional_Chinese: 將黎席斯的祝福傳播到整個馬德里加爾！ 將黎席斯的眼淚撒在地上。 歡迎來到俱樂部，協助！

English: An Assist should naturally have a giving heart. It's one of the fundamental teachings of Aenn, the Ringmaster Hero.
Traditional_Chinese: 首先神職者要擁有奉獻的心，如果沒有這份心的話，無法成為神職者，這是指揮英雄阿利安諾的基本教義之一。

English: They call me Kidmen Nicore. I'm a Sergeant at the Madrigal Job Training Center and I hope to guide brave souls as they follow the path to becoming an Assist.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是瑪德利賈職業訓練中心的凱德尼克。我將引導你成為完美的神職者，加油!

English: Be careful out there, young one. I sense great potential in you.
Traditional_Chinese: 奉獻的精神!絕對不要忘記喔。

English: We must lead these brave adventurers on the right path, Radyon.
Traditional_Chinese: 哈哈哈～就是我們指引他們，並讓他們走回正路的！對～就是我們！

English: Hello, my friend. There is something I require your assistance with. Will you help me?
Traditional_Chinese: 有件事情要你幫忙～你願意嗎？

English: The Heroes saved us all from certain doom. We are forever grateful for their bravery. Will you follow the path of the Heroes?
Traditional_Chinese: 他們拯救了世界，後代子孫將永遠記得！

English: My name is Sage Kimel and I am here as a guide to those seeking the knowledge of the Heroes. Sage Radion is the greatest Wise Man of all of us. If you seek knowledge, go to him.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是8位賢者中的其中一位，我承接大賢者拉迪溫的遺志，在這裡負責記錄英雄的歷史！

English: The Heroes live on through all of us.
Traditional_Chinese: 英雄永遠存活在人民的心中！

English: Hello there, traveler! This area, the plain of Bubble, was created by Bubble himself, long ago.
Traditional_Chinese: 這裡是傳說的波布爾的平原！

English: The earth trembled as the battle between Shade and the Heroes was fought viciously. Scars from this battle can be seen all over madrigal.
Traditional_Chinese: 至今人們聽到那個傳說，還是會害怕不已……

English: Welcome, my name is Kurmin Hersan and I watch over the Plain of Bubble. It's an amazing area filled with life. It is a powerful place that seems to fill your soul with love and euphoria.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是負責管理波布爾的平原，歡迎你來到此地！

English: Oh man! All this shoveling, all day long! Can't I have a break?!
Traditional_Chinese: 劍的響亮混動了天空，巨大的斧頭指向大地。所有的東西即將被奪走的象徵..

English: *Langdrong grins at you*\nYou want me to say hello to you? Haha, never! I may live like you humans but I am nothing like you! So nyah!
Traditional_Chinese: *壞笑*\n你好啊?以為我會這樣說嘛?哈..我做的事情雖然跟人類很像，但是我跟完全不同啦!!

English: Me? You want to know who I am? Hahaha! What a shame the feeling isn't mutual. I am High-Dwarpet Langdrong Clo and I'm the keeper of the Mercenaries Book of Technique. Happy?
Traditional_Chinese: 我?哈哈，真懂事啊。我很欣賞你的那個想了解我的心，嘻嘻。我是杜爾沛，名叫克羅。擔任保管勇者的東西。

English: Steer clear of the other Dwarpets. They may not be as nice as I am.
Traditional_Chinese: 不要隨便欺負杜爾沛啊，不然總有一天會造到天譴的。

English: My name is Flaris Pang. I am the oldest son of the Pang family. We have managed the Lodelights for generations.
Traditional_Chinese: 我是管理生命光柱的布拉里‧乓！

English: Need a moment? Grab a chocolate bar from Losha's Premium Foods Shop!
Traditional_Chinese: 布拉里斯最佳餐飲店，請大家來多多捧場喔！

English: I wonder, can you do something for me? I could really use your help.
Traditional_Chinese: 要幫什麼呢?我蘿夏都沒差~

English: Hello, welcome to Losha's Premium Foods Shop! We are here to serve the citizens of Flarine with the most tasty treats penya can buy! So whaddya say, are ya' hungry?
Traditional_Chinese: 目前跟我妹及叔叔3個人一起生活~我覺得很幸福了。

English: My name is Losha Encline. Apprentice Sotta, my little sister Loyah, and myself all live together and help to run my Food Shop. I've been told I'm the best cook in Madrigal! Care to try a Kimbap?
Traditional_Chinese: 我的名字是洛莎恩克萊恩，索達學徒、我的妹妹蘿雅和我住在一起，幫助經營我的食品店。 我可是瑪德利賈最好的廚師！ 想嚐嚐紫菜包飯嗎？

English: Thank you, come again!
Traditional_Chinese: 下次再來喔~做更好吃的東西給你吃。

English: Hungry? Visit my sister Losha's Food Shop! *YUM*
Traditional_Chinese: 要不要嘗試瑪德利賈的天才廚師的美食？！

English: My sister and I make a lot of super yummy food! One day, I hope to open a shop of my own, but I still have a lot to learn. Will you try some of our delicious Chicken Sticks? The secret's in the sauce!
Traditional_Chinese: 在這餐飲店賣的東西，都是我親手做的，都很美味的喔！

English: My name is Loyah Encline, and I'm a cook for my elder sister Losha's Food Shop. We're working on a new recipe for Mushpoie Stew, but I can't tell you the ingredients. It's a family secret!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是跟我姊一起經營菈菈安餐飲店！請多多來捧場喔！

English: Bon Appetit!
Traditional_Chinese: 謝謝你的光臨，歡迎再來！

English: Are you a Vagrant? Do you need weapons or armor? I've got what you need!
Traditional_Chinese: 我販賣著所有見習生所需要的盾牌喔～

English: Hello, potential customer! Thanks for stopping by! Please, feel free to look at my collection of Vagrant weapons and armor. Careful though, you touch it, you buy it!
Traditional_Chinese: 哈哈哈～這裡有很多種商品讓您挑選～請慢慢看喔～

English: My name is Luda and I run the Vagrant Store of Flarine. I opened this shop after Boboku and Boboko stopped selling Vagrant items. Now I corner the market, hahaha!
Traditional_Chinese: 我是繼承波哥波弟的見習生用品與盾牌的商品，並在這裡開了一家見習生商店的路達～

English: Be careful out there. I wouldn't want to lose a potential customer! *Chuckles*
Traditional_Chinese: 希望您能有個難忘的冒險～

English: Come one, come all! Get your supplies here! You're gonna need it!
Traditional_Chinese: 這裡有賣很多東西喔，希望你會喜歡！

English: Listen carefully, here's what I need you to do.
Traditional_Chinese: 恩~希望多多少少能幫上忙！

English: Going somewhere? You look a little unprepared, so I'd think twice about leaving Flarine without stocking up on supplies. Good thing for you, I'm here. So, whaddya need?
Traditional_Chinese: 我弟魯尼怎麼可能跟那件事有關呢！他應該離開這裡不會再回來的！
